entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023
